title: Pupil instruction: health framework: sexual health.
subject: Pupilinstruction
healthframework
sexualhealth

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law establishes the Instructional Quality Commission and requires the commission to, among other things, recommend curriculum frameworks to the State Board of Education.

This bill would require the commission, during the next revision of the publication "Health Framework for California Public Schools," to consider including, and recommending for adoption by the state board, specific content related to sexual health instruction to educate pupils about dating abuse and digital violence, as described.

extras.impact_clause: An act to add Section 51900.3 to the Education Code, relating to pupil instruction.
